alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bay County through 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/... At 550 PM EDT/450 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hiland Park, or over Panama City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, Bay Harbor, College Station, Bayou George, West Panama City and Biltmore Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
